Package index

All functions

fishLengthAssess-package fishLengthAssess
Length-based evaluation of fish stock and fishery
lbsprWrapper()
Estimation of SPR using LBSPR method (Hordyk et al. 2016)
LcFunc()
Estimate length at full selectivity using the mode of the length-frequency distribution #'
LengthComp-class
Length composition object
LengthCompExampleFreq
Length composition example - frequencies
LengthCompExampleLength
Length composition example - raw length
LoptFunc()
Optimum harvest length Beverton (1992)
PLcFunc()
Proportion of catch above the minumum size limit
PmatFunc()
Proportion of the catch that is above length at maturity
PmegaFunc()
Proportion of mega-spawners, re-cast to 'avoid' mega spawners so that 100% is the target
poolLengthComp()
Utility that pools length data when multiple columns exist
PoptFunc()
Proportion of specimens within optimum length range in the catch
